format: gfm

```{r}
library(sf)
library(dplyr)

origin <- stplanr::geo_code("Leeds railway station")
destination <- stplanr::geo_code("University of Leeds")
r1 = stplanr::route(origin, destination)
plot(r1)
r2 = stplanr::route(origin, destination, route_fun = stplanr::route_osrm)
plot(r2)
origin_sf = origin |>
  sf::st_point() |>
  sf::st_sfc(crs = 4326)
destination_sf = destination |>
  sf::st_point() |>
  sf::st_sfc(crs = 4326)
od = c(origin_sf, destination_sf)
r3 = osrm::osrmTrip(od)
plot(r3[[1]]$trip)
```

Conclusion: osrmpkg is fine for now.
